name: mcp-server-alation
description: Access Alation Data Catalog metadata and context for AI agents via MCP server.

rating.reason: Good documentation overall with comprehensive descriptions for both tools. The 'alation_context' tool provides excellent detail about functionality, usage context, and examples, though the signature parameter documentation could be clearer. The 'get_data_products' tool has clear descriptions and good examples but lacks parameter descriptions in the schema itself. Both tools have intuitive names and adequate parameter specifications, representing solid B-level documentation.
